summary: The game has unlimited levels, whereas in each level the number of cards rises.The figures on the cards are randomly chosen from the 560 figures of Pokémon, using the Pokemon API. The score is differentially calculated between levels.

A social media app, in which members can offer various services, each one according to their knowledge,  experience and will. For example, private lessons, pet care, alternative medicine etc. Each TIM member who provides a service to another member, gets points (coins) for that service, and with these coins  they can pay for a service from another member.

A classic memory game of Simon, in which a single player competes with the computer. The computer chooses a random sequence made of four colors and the player needs to repeat that sequence. On each level, the sequence gets longer. For each level the player gets a score saved. Once the player fails to repeat the sequence, they can restart the game.

A small app which allows getting a summary about every Star Wars  movie and choose the user's favorite. The app uses an SWAPI API for getting the data.For building this app I've used react hooks, local storage.

App that shows the weather for 5 days ahead everywhere in the world. On the initial run, the app requests access for the user's location and shows the weather there. The app feature's a search bar allowing the user to get the weather for a specific place they type in. The user can choose between Celsius and Fahrenheit units. The app has a responsive layout. The app uses openweathermap API.

A social media app for sharing second-hand children and baby items. The app is a bulletin board of items users wish to give away or are looking for. Users can publish ads to give or request items, contact others by mail to arrange transfers, and define a smart agent to receive automated notifications when relevant items are posted.
